PAD_AfterCombat.synopsis: The player has defeated a Spectator and a group of Drow that were petrified by the spectator (something a spectator should not be able to do).

PAD_EnteringArea.synopsis: The player approaches an area with a bunch of stone drow.

PAD_AfterCombat_0.text: One wrong move and I'd have been a statue, imprisoned for eternity...
PAD_AfterCombat_0.context: InternalNodeContext: The spectator isn't near the players when the fight ends or the player failed an arcana check about the spectator

PAD_AfterCombat_1.speaker: Player
PAD_AfterCombat_1.text: Drow. And worse... What were they doing here?
